description: [Status: stable] [Name: pytest-deprecated-yield-fixture] [Message: @pytest.yield_fixture is deprecated, use @pytest.fixture] What it does Checks for pytest.yield_fixture usage. Why is this bad? pytest.yield_fixture is deprecated. pytest.fixture should be used instead. Example import pytest @pytest.yield_fixture() def my_fixture(): obj = SomeClass() yield obj obj.cleanup() Use instead: import pytest @pytest.fixture() def my_fixture(): obj = SomeClass() yield obj obj.cleanup()
